mean_en: to keep a building, a machine, etc. in good condition by checking or repairing it regularly; to make something continue at the same level, standard, etc.
sentence: He cleans his award every day to maintain its shine.
sentence_trans: 他每天都擦拭奖杯，使其保持光洁。
word_etyma: main手 + tain拿 → 用手拿住 → maintain维持
